title: Interpretation of a dream about the person who gave me banknotes

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of the person who gave me banknotes, in the following article we present to you the interpretation of the dream of the person who gave me banknotes, in which the person throughout his life tries to work and tries to collect money so that he can, as the Almighty said in Surah Al-Fajr (And you love money with great love), God made love Money is the year of life, and because it is a saw in a dream, scholars have narrated many interpretations of dreams. Interpretation of a dream about who gave me banknotes. The scholar Ibn Sirin gave the interpretation of seeing someone giving a priest banknotes in a dream. We report these interpretations as follows: To give someone paper money in a dream symbolizes a god and this person is unknown. Whereas if the person in the dream knows the dreamer, the dreamer will receive many benefits beyond this donor. A husband giving his wife banknotes in The dream portends a short pregnancy. Seeing an unmarried woman receiving notes from someone indicates engagement and marriage to a wealthy man of status and morals. Interpretation of a dream about someone who gave me notes about single people. Seeing someone giving someone paper money in a dream has many connotations that we mention in the following points: It indicates This vision refers to a single woman’s ambition for success and progress in life and the intense ambition she has. Paper money in a person’s dream symbolizes money or getting a job. Seeing a person as a beautiful person giving him banknotes indicates the existence of a relationship with a person of good character with whom he will find happiness. By God's command. Giving a woman coins in a dream is sadness and bad news. Single people wasting banknotes in a dream is a bad omen for the end of courtship or wasting time on something of no value or benefit. Interpretation of a dream about a person giving banknotes to a married woman. Below we present different interpretations of seeing a person He gives banknotes to a married woman in a dream: Banknotes in a married woman’s dream symbolize family stability and marital happiness, as well as good children. Seeing someone giving money to a married woman on the street means that he will meet a loyal and sincere friend. Seeing a married woman giving her husband money and her face being painted indicates For his great love for her and the prosperity in which she lives with her husband and children. Interpretation of giving banknotes in a dream to a pregnant woman. Banknotes in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate ease of childbirth. Gold coins symbolize a female child and silver coins symbolize a male child. Coins in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate the difficulty of childbirth and the pain of pregnancy. The husband’s gift of money to his wife means carrying good offspring, and God Almighty alone knows what is in the wombs. Interpretation of a dream about receiving money from a familiar person: This dream illustrates the strong and close relationship between the dreamer and the person to whom he gave money in the dream. This dream can be evidence of the beginning of a partnership between the dreamer. And the person who gave him money in the dream, and this is good news for the success of this trade and the achievement of a large profit for both of them by the command of a god. Interpretation of the dream of obtaining money from a living person. There are two cases of this dream in which the interpretation differs from the other. We mention

title: Learn about the interpretation of the gift of gold in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A gift of gold in a dream has many meanings and connotations, and every expert in interpretation has his own interpretations of the divine evidence that he saw in the dream. Therefore, we mentioned in this article the most important different interpretations of seeing a gift of gold in a dream, whether the gift is an earring, a chain, or a gold necklace. Let us learn about these indicators together in the following paragraphs. A gift of gold in a dream. The interpretation of a dream of a gift of gold in a dream is one of the interpretations that symbolizes... The emergence of evil and conspiracies that will cause him a lot of troubles and problems that can destroy his life. The interpretation of seeing a gift of gold in a dream for an unmarried girl, if she has received many gifts of gold, indicates that she will marry a rich but greedy man. If she sees An unmarried woman dreams that someone was preparing a white gold ring for her and she accepted it, then this vision is a sign of her good luck. Seeing a white gold gift, if the girl does not accept it, then this dream portends that she will miss a very important opportunity in the future. If a woman dreams For someone she loves to give her gold, it means that she will get some money for something important that she did in the past. To dream of receiving a gift of gold utensils in a dream for a woman, may be a good omen for her with a lot of sustenance soon. A dream of a gift of gold in a dream may indicate A woman indicates that she will assume an important position in her life. A gift of gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she has received bracelets made of gold, this indicates that she will soon marry a capable and useful man. Seeing the dreamer receiving gifts of gold in a dream It may mean that he will soon marry one person who has a lot of money, especially if the dreamer is a single girl. It was mentioned in the interpretation of the vision of a gift of gold by Ibn Sirin in a single man’s dream that it is evidence of inheritance, and God Almighty knows best. Ibn Sirin says that the dream of a gift of gold is evidence On the generosity of the dreamer and indicates good relations between the dreamer and the other person. But if a young man receives a gift of gold in a dream, this may indicate that he will soon find his life partner and may indicate the discovery of many hidden talents. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on the Google website Interpretation of dreams online. A gift of gold in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams about a gift of gold for a single woman. If she sees that she received many golden gifts and they were in the shape of a jug, this indicates the girl’s engagement soon to a young man who will be her partner. In the future. An unmarried girl seeing in a dream that she is receiving a lot of golden gifts may also indicate that she will marry a rich man, but he will be a person with bad qualities, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a golden gift for a single woman from a famous person: If a girl sees that she is receiving a gift of gold from Someone you know, this is a sign of wealth or that she will soon hear happy news. If the gift is from an unknown person, this indicates a promotion at work and a move to an important position. But if the girl sees in her dream that someone

title: Interpretation of a dream about the Prophet’s birthday in a dream for an unmarried woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Prophet’s birth in a dream by Ibn Sirin: There are many different dreams that we see in our dreams, depending on the situation or the general body of the dream, as each dream has interpretations that differ from other interpretations, and great interpreters have contributed to the interpretation of dreams in many ways. Such interpretations have brought many From humans. And joy for many people, as it can cause tension in many forms, and in this we find the interpretation of a dream about the Prophet’s birthday. Interpretation of a dream about the Prophet’s birthday in a single woman’s dream. There are many visions and dreams that one girl sees in a dream, and these visions carry many signs, whether they are Good or bad for a man. Interpretation of a dream about the Prophet’s birthday in a dream for an unmarried woman, as it carries the following signs: A dream about the Prophet’s birthday in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the dreams that has multiple meanings. As this vision is a sign that this girl is close to going to Umrah, and God knows best. Also, a dream about the Prophet’s Mawlid could be a result of constantly thinking about the Prophet’s Mawlid. In addition, a single girl can see this dream as a desire for goodness and happiness in her life. This vision also suggests blessings and goodness for the unmarried girl and the death of worry and sadness. See also: What The meaning of divorce in a dream for a married woman and the interpretation of a dream about divorce by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the Prophet’s Mawlid in a dream for a married woman: A married woman sees many dreams in one dream. These visions and dreams indicate multiple signs and connections, and the interpretation of a dream about the Prophet’s Mawlid is one of the visions that have been interpreted in different ways. The following indicators: Seeing a married woman in a dream on the occasion of the Prophet’s birthday is one of the dreams that indicates recovery from diseases for the one who has the vision. It is also a sign of women’s liberation from the worries and problems they suffer from. In addition, dreaming of the sweetness of Christmas in a married woman’s dream is One of the dreams that means good. Also, seeing a married woman attending a feast on the occasion of the Prophet’s birthday, this is good for him and the woman. As this vision indicates a year full of goodness and goodness, especially if the party is with her relatives and friends. In addition to seeing the invitation to a birthday party Prophetic, which is a good thing for women. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see cooking in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man, according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about the Prophet’s birthday for a pregnant woman. There are many visions that a pregnant woman sees in a dream, as there are many visions that may disturb a pregnant woman. It may be burdened with humanity, and the dream of the Prophet’s birthday is one of the dreams that indicate many signs. And signals. A pregnant woman is represented by each of the following connotations, such as: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet’s Mawlid in a dream is one of the visions that have multiple connotations. Like a pregnant woman seeing the Prophet’s Mawlid in a dream, this indicates God’s care for her. In addition, seeing the Prophet’s Mawlid In the dream of a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of seeing a giraffe in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Giraffe in a dream: The giraffe is a wild animal that is considered one of the tallest and largest wild animals, and it has a shape and size that makes it stand out from other animals, as it is distinguished by the length of its legs and its extreme length. neck. Seeing a giraffe in a dream has many different meanings and interpretations depending on the dreamer’s condition, and we will return to our article on the interpretation of seeing a giraffe in a dream and its meaning as reported by scholars. Giraffe in a dream Seeing a giraffe in a dream is a good thing and indicates that something good will happen, as the giraffe is a peaceful pet, unlike Predators and other carnivores. If you see a giraffe, taking into account the shape of its long neck, it shows the height, high status, superiority, and prestigious position that the dreamer will acquire. Also, his vision indicates the extent of the dreamer’s wisdom and sobriety, his ability to manage time and money, and his adherence to good values ​​and morals. Sometimes, seeing a giraffe in a dream indicates something that is neither good nor bad for the dreamer. Seeing a giraffe in a dream means that the dreamer has a graceful body and has great self-confidence. Giraffe in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a giraffe in a dream varies according to the situation of the fortuneteller, But in absolute terms, seeing a giraffe in a dream indicates the public good, as it is an animal and a pet, as we explained previously. Seeing a giraffe indicates long life, eminence, high status, patience, and also shows intelligence and the ability to avoid mistakes and bad deeds. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a giraffe in a dream is evidence of the longevity of the dreamer, and that a giraffe may indicate that the dreamer will lose a lot of money. Giraffe in a dream Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi says that the giraffe is a beautiful and beautiful animal. Seeing it in a dream is a sign of kindness, but sometimes seeing a giraffe may mean that the dreamer needs to think and think about his life and see things in another way. Since the giraffe is a herbivorous animal and eats with its long tongue, this vision is a sign of wisdom, tenderness, and a good mind that characterizes the dreamer. And he has the right to see it. If you see the horns of a small giraffe, this is evidence that the dreamer is a woman of status and superiority. The giraffe in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a giraffe for an unmarried woman suggests many meanings and associations, most of which indicate goodness and blessing, as the giraffe embodies grace and is A wonderfully stylized figure. She was at work, traveling abroad, or studying. The scholar Ibn Sirin also explained that a giraffe in a dream indicates a blessing with money, and a giraffe in an unmarried girl’s dream could be news for her about a close marriage to a person who has a high financial level and is fit to do, It also suggests that the girl with the dream works hard and strives to achieve her goal and emulates a high and prestigious position in society. Seeing a giraffe in one’s dream symbolizes how close he is to Almighty God and that he performs worship to the fullest and does many good deeds. A giraffe got married in...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fat person and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an obese person and its meaning: There may be many people who suffer from obesity and are overweight, as they may resort to a system that helps them lose weight. It is worth noting that obesity is one of the most dangerous diseases that exist around the world, due to the many other diseases that it causes. For people, obesity can affect movement and activity and make the person inactive and unable to do the simplest things. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fat person and its meaningObesity is a common disease in our time, due to the presence of many fast foods and meals that contain large amounts of calories, and seeing the person Obese people can indicate these signs: This vision is considered by a human being to bring happiness and goodness to the dreamer in the coming days. Also, seeing him in a man’s dream may mean that he will get a project from which he will earn a lot of money. Seeing a fat woman in a dream is one of the signs of goodness. In her coming years. When a fat person seems to become thinner, it may be a sign of many problems in his life. A tall person who can become fat in a dream indicates that there is deception and deceit in his life. These many interpretations vary depending on the details of the dreamer’s dream, And the conditions in which he lives, and this is what the interpreters have interpreted. See also: Interpretation of dreams of a sick dead person dying in a dream in detail from the most famous interpretation scholars. Seeing a fat dead person in a dream. There may be many people who we may see in our dreams who have died, and because of our great love for them, we may see them often. And the interpretation of a dream about a fat dead manYou can come up with the following people: It can be considered one of the signs of the status and position that the deceased will acquire in a good outcome. In the event that the deceased becomes obese through the food that the fortuneteller gave him, this indicates the benefits that he will obtain. But if The deceased is fat but suffering from hunger, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer from many problems. In general, obesity in a man’s dream indicates that it is a sign of wealth and wealth for the dreamer. I dream that a fat man overcomes me in a dream. Obesity is the main cause of many serious diseases that can That the viewer suffers from it, and this is worth mentioning. A dream about a fat man hitting me can indicate many indicators, the most important of which are: If obesity appears in general, it is considered a sign of blessing and livelihood. It is also one of the signs that he will get a job very soon. It is worth Noting that obesity is a promising dream for those who dream of a lot of happiness and kindness. title: Interpretation of a dream when you see someone asking you for water in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream in which you see someone asking you for water.. Water is considered one of the basics of life for all living creatures and everything that moves on the Earth.. Life cannot continue without the presence of water, so divine wisdom is required. Nearly three-quarters of the Earth’s surface is covered with water, in addition to renewal Resources, water and its narrowness through the water cycle in nature, which is represented by evaporation and condensation, then again in precipitation, and this confirms the importance of water, but what is the interpretation of a dream in which you see someone asking you for water, according to the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of dreams to see someone asking you for water, according to the most famous Interpreters: When a person feels thirsty, he begins to search for a place, regardless of where he is, and this stems from the dangers of thirst on the health and safety of the body and what has entered it. Interpretation of a dream in which you see someone asking you for water, according to the most famous interpreters: When a person sees in his dream, someone asking him for water He should look for those close to him. title: Interpretation of a dream about my aunt hitting my mother in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my aunt hitting my mother in a dream Scientists give different meanings regarding the interpretation of a dream about hitting, so we learn about the interpretation of a dream about my aunt hitting my mother in a dream and other details that will interest you. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt hitting my mother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt hitting my mother in a dream. Beating can be a sign of benefit, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a beating in a dream indicates the benefit that will accrue to the beating, God willing. If a young man sees being beaten in a dream, he can express benefit for the recipient of the beating, and God is Most High. I know, except that seeing the mother hitting the son in a dream may be evidence of the sin that the son committed and he must return, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of my aunt cursing me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my aunt cursing me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing an insult from someone in a dream can express About the harm that befalls the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. When you see insults in a dream, it could be a sign of the humiliation of the one who insulted him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself cursed in a dream, it may be a sign of disrespect, and God has all knowledge. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt laughing at Dream Interpretation of a dream about my aunt laughing in a dream Seeing my aunt happy may mean good news, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his aunt happy in a dream, this may be evidence of the good news he hears, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees a happy aunt, she may express her happiness, and God knows best. When Seeing a happy, unmarried aunt in a dream could be a sign of goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt giving birth in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt who gave up vomiting in a dream. Vomiting can lead to things worthy of praise, and God knows best. Where if the dreamer sees a person vomiting in a dream, he has repentance, and God knows best. I know the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself vomiting, this may be evidence of the return of the trust to its owner, and God knows the unseen. When you see vomiting, it may be a sign of recovery, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my aunt’s engagement to her son in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my aunt’s engagement to her son in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of seeing this. However, seeing a woman engaged to a son in a dream could be a sign that I will be free from trouble, God willing. Also, seeing admonition and joy can show goodness and comfort, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees engagement And sadness in a dream can express sadness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about my aunt who expelled me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about expelling my aunt in a dream. Expulsion from relatives can indicate injustice from the family, and God knows the unseen. So if the dreamer sees expulsion from his relatives’ house, it may lead him to injustice, and God knows the unseen. The highest and most knowledgeableIf a young man sees in a dream that his relatives have been expelled, this may be evidence of the lack of kinship, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees that she has been expelled from her family in a dream, this may be a sign of the removal of the uterus, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about removing teeth and molars by hand in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing teeth and molars extracted by hand in a dream: It is one of the visions that people are greatly disturbed by, because tooth extraction is one of the procedures that makes people feel severe pain accompanied by fear and anxiety. You may also be interested in meeting a lion in a dream, so they have a strong passion to know the multiple meanings that it refers to. This vision is in the real world, according to the situation in which it was in the dream, and through the following article we will learn with you about the clues and interpretations that have been put forward for seeing a tooth and a tooth extracted in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an extracted tooth in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a lower molar in a dream indicates Anxiety and sadness that haunt the dreamer’s family. Seeing the extraction of a tooth or molar in a dream for a single girl. If one sees the extraction of teeth and molars by hand in a dream for an unmarried woman, this means that she will separate from her lover or fiancé if she becomes engaged. Extracting teeth and molars by hand in a dream for a pregnant woman is considered an interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman extracting her molar or teeth is a promising act, but if it suddenly falls out, it appears that God is warning her about something. Interpretation of seeing teeth and molars extracted by hand in a dream When people see a vision of teeth being extracted by hand in a dream, this vision makes them feel excessive fear and anxiety, so We will clarify these interpretations as follows: Some dream interpretation scholars interpreted this vision as evidence of the end of difficulties in the dreamer’s life or the removal of enemies and harmful people from their lives. It was also interpreted as a vision that portends evil, as it can be considered a sign of death and the loss of a loved one. When People see that they are cutting a tooth in a dream, then this vision is evidence of goodness and the end of problems in the dreamer’s life and the full repayment of debts owed. There are other interpretations of this dream stating that the owner of this vision will enjoy a long life and a long life. Ibn Sirin’s opinion on pulling a tooth in a dream is because Ibn Sirin Sirin is one of the most famous scholars of interpretation in the Arab world in ancient times. Many people search for an interpretation of the vision of pulling teeth and molars by hand in a dream that he raised about this vision, which is: Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of the vision of pulling teeth and molars by hand in a dream without a doctor indicates longevity and health. While the interpretation of seeing teeth being extracted without pain or blood is evidence of making the right decisions in an important matter of professional or academic life. The interpretation of a dream of teeth being extracted may be evidence of solving problems in one of the problems he faced in his life, but he could not return. Of this decision. There is another interpretation of this vision that refers to the strength and ability to make important decisions in a person and deal with many different situations. Competence and professionalism is one of the interpretations given to see the same person extracting his teeth himself without tools or a doctor. Human teeth falling out in a dream, through the paragraph Next, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing teeth and molars extracted by hand in a dream for a man, and this interpretation is as follows: Interpretation

title: Interpretation of visiting a doctor in a dream for different cases

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a doctor in a dream for different cases. Today we share with you the interpretation of seeing a doctor in a dream, which is one of the disturbing visions that causes panic, pain, and feelings of depression, as some believe that the doctor is a symbol of illness or a sign of health, although it is a symbol of healing and healing in reality, but this dream It carries with it mystery and causes panic in the soul. What is this dream? It has praiseworthy connotations. We learn about those concepts and symbols that it carries in its aspects through our article. Doctor in a dream. There are many interpretations that have appeared in the interpretation of visiting a doctor in a dream through what was mentioned in the books of translators, including Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Let us get to know the most important of these interpretations on As follows: Seeing a doctor in a dream means that the dreamer enjoys wisdom, fame, and a high position in work and life. Seeing a doctor in a dream being healed symbolizes recovery from his illnesses, and God knows best. As for seeing the death of a doctor in a dream, it symbolizes the death of the mother, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself in a dream working as a doctor, this indicates that he will obtain the job and the power that will make him famous. Seeing the doctor selling coffins indicates the dreamer’s betrayal of his relatives. Seeing the doctor entering in a dream means a speedy recovery for the pioneer. Interpretation of a doctor’s visit in a dream for a single woman, a girl’s dream Seeing a doctor in a dream is one of the visions that makes her search for its meanings, especially if she is looking for her life partner. Seeing a girl going to the doctor in a dream symbolizes that she is in severe distress and needs someone to help her. As for seeing the doctor entering the bachelor’s room, it means she will be cured of her illness. If you see an unmarried woman in a dream about a doctor proposing that you marry her, this means that she will live a happy, healthy, disease-free life. And seeing a female doctor in one’s dream symbolizes the happy married life that she will live in the near future, accompanied by a good husband with a noble character. Vision An unmarried woman in a dream means that she has become a doctor and this indicates that she will be promoted to higher positions. In seeing a doctor for an unmarried woman, it symbolizes success in her academic life and obtaining an ideal job. But seeing a doctor entering a girl is only from unwanted visions that does not bode well. Fine, indicates that she abandons her fiancé or falls into misfortunes and illnesses. Interpretation of visiting a doctor in a dream for a married woman: A married woman feels the need to cling to hope if she sees a doctor in a dream and her husband is sick. What does this vision symbolize? Let us learn about the indicators that it carries as follows: Seeing a married woman in a dream with a doctor is one of the good visions that carry good interpretations and indicate a quick recovery and relief from problems and distress. But if the married woman sees in her dream that the doctor enters her room when she is not in She needs him, as this indicates the suffering that she is going through in her life. In general, the doctor in the life of a married woman symbolizes the lawful money, kindness, and livelihood that pour into her life. And about seeing a female doctor in

title: Interpretation of seeing rabbits in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Imam Al-Sadiq.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rabbits in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Imam Al-Sadiq. He sees animals like rabbits in his sleep, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing rabbits in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the dream of seeing rabbits in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing rabbits in a dream indicates kindness and abundance, Especially if the dreamer is a merchant. One of the praiseworthy symbols of this vision is that it expresses the offspring of a married man. As for the most hated symbols of this vision, it expresses the wandering of the dreamer’s mind and his loss of his ability to distinguish between right and wrong. If the dreamer dreams of seeing small rabbits, this indicates To the obstacles that the dreamer is going through. In the event that you see carrying small rabbits in a dream, this dream reflects the bad condition of the dreamer and a difficult period in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is chasing rabbits in a dream, this indicates that there is a dispute between him and one of his friends in reality. When he sees If the dreamer is talking to a rabbit in a dream, this shows the extent of the dreamer’s need for someone to support him and give him advice. Interpretation of the dream of seeing rabbits in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing rabbits in a dream expresses the many difficulties that the dreamer faces in order to achieve what he wants on earth. In a dream about a black rabbit, this vision expresses the bad condition of the dreamer due to the problems he faces. In the case of a dream about hunting rabbits in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better. As for a dream about slaughtering a rabbit in a dream, this is a sign that something bad will happen, and this vision is for a married person. It indicates the emergence of marital disputes that portend separation, and God knows best. In the case of a dream of talking to a rabbit, this indicates the extent of your attachment to the girl in reality. If the fortuneteller dreams that he is holding a rabbit in a dream, the meaning of this lies in earning money illegally. If he sees The dreamer is that a rabbit is chasing him in a dream, then this is a sign of major disagreements between him and one of his friends. Interpretation of the dream of seeing rabbits in a dream Interpretation of Imam Al-SadiqAs for Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of this vision, it is an indication of problems between him and his goals. In the event that rabbits appear in a dream, the meaning of this The dream lies in the changes you are going through on the professional level. Seeing a white rabbit in a dream indicates that what he wants in reality will come true. Seeing rabbits jumping in a dream is a favorable vision and indicates achievement at work. For a single person, this vision portends marriage to a good girl Seeing a rabbit in a dream for a married person indicates marital problems that are bothering the dreamer in reality. Among the indicators of seeing rabbits in a dream is a sign of the presence of fake friends in reality. When the dreamer dreams that he is running after rabbits, the meaning of this lies in wasting time on things that are not useful. The dreamer.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a rabbit feeding in a dream. Seeing a rabbit feeding a rabbit in a dream indicates the desire of others to help the dreamer in reality. It is a good indicator of this vision.
